headline: Loews Corporation Comments on Delaware Supreme Court's Ruling
summary: Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) announced today that the Delaware Supreme Court issued a ruling in the litigation relating to its 2018 acquisition of the minority limited partner interests in its Boardwalk Pipelines subsidiary. The Supreme Court found that there was a breach in connection with the underlying partnership agreement and remanded the issue of whether Loews was liable for tortious interference back to the Delaware Court of Chancery. content.title: Loews Corporation Comments on Delaware Supreme Court's Ruling
content.summary: Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) announced today that the Delaware Supreme Court issued a ruling in the litigation relating to its 2018 acquisition of the minority limited partner interests in its Boardwalk Pipelines subsidiary. The Supreme Court found that there was a breach in connection with the underlying partnership agreement and remanded the issue of whether Loews was liable for tortious interference back to the Delaware Court of Chancery.
